Direct Known Subclasses:
JPOProgram_mxJPO, MQLProgram_mxJPO
public abstract class AbstractProgram_mxJPO
extends AbstractCode_mxJPO

Common definition for the code of a program.

AbstractProgram_mxJPO

protected AbstractProgram_mxJPO(TypeDef_mxJPO _typeDef,
                                String _mxName)
Constructor used to initialize the type definition enumeration and the name.

Parameters:
_typeDef - type definition of the program
_mxName - MX name of the program object
Method Detail

parse

protected void parse(String _url,
                     String _content)

Parses all program specific URL values. This includes:

  • deferred execution
  • execute user
  • needs context of a business object
  • program is downloadable
  • input / output of the program is piped
  • program is pooled

Overrides:
parse in class AbstractCode_mxJPO
Parameters:
_url - URL to parse
_content - content depending on the URL
See Also:
AbstractAdminObject_mxJPO.IGNORED_URLS

writeObject

protected void writeObject(ParameterCache_mxJPO _paramCache,
                           Appendable _out)
Must be implemented so that the class could be derived. The method is only a stub implementation.

Specified by:
writeObject in class AbstractAdminObject_mxJPO
Parameters:
_paramCache - parameter cache; ignored
_out - ignored

writeUpdateCode

protected void writeUpdateCode(ParameterCache_mxJPO _paramCache,
                               Appendable _out,
                               String _markStart,
                               String _markEnd,
                               String _linePrefix)
                        throws IOException
Appends the TCL update code to _out for this MQL program. This includes:
  • deferred execution
  • execute user
  • description
  • hidden flag
  • needs context of a business object
  • program is downloadable
  • input / output of the program is piped
  • program is pooled

Parameters:
_paramCache - parameter cache
_out - update file (where the MQL program with the TCL update file is written)
_markStart - start marker of the TCL update
_markEnd - end marker of the TCL update
_linePrefix - line prefix (before each TCL update line)
Throws:
IOException - if the TCL code could not be written to the file

makeLinePrefix

protected String makeLinePrefix(String _linePrefix,
                                CharSequence _lines)
For each line in the _lines text (separated by new line) the _linePrefix is added.

Parameters:
_linePrefix - prefix for the lines; or null if no line prefix is defined
_lines - complete lines as text with new lines
Returns:
new lines with prefixes

extractTclUpdateCode

protected String extractTclUpdateCode(ParameterCache_mxJPO _paramCache,
                                      boolean _execute,
                                      StringBuilder _prgCode,
                                      String _markStart,
                                      String _markEnd,
                                      String _linePrefix)
Extracts from _prgCode the TCL update code which is between _markStart and _markEnd defined. Each line of the code starts with _linePrefix. Only if _execute is set, the found TCL code is returned.

Parameters:
_paramCache - parameter cache
_execute - true if TCL update code will be executed
_prgCode - program code
_markStart - start marker
_markEnd - end marker
_linePrefix - line prefix
Returns:
extracted TCL update code from _prgCode
